author: dvholten
msg: some contribution to the general cleanup for the next version:
1.) replace some 'type var[]' with  'type[] var' - convention
3.) replace some simple string-concatenation from StringBuffer-append() to the string + string notation. The idea is to let the compiler choose between StringBuffer or StringBuilder to do it.
6.) change order of (public/final/static/) modifiers to standard order
7.) replace some manual copy-loops with System.arraycopy()
This is an empty revision for padding.
